SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

com.netflix.msl.msg
Class PayloadChunk

java.lang.Object
  com.netflix.msl.msg.PayloadChunk

public class PayloadChunk
extends Object

A payload chunk is a self-contained block of application data that is encrypted, verified, and optionally compressed independent of other chunks. A message payload may contain one or more chunks.

Payload chunks are bound to a specific message by the message ID.

Each payload chunk in a message is sequentially ordered by the chunk sequence number. The sequence number starts at 1 and is incremented by 1 on each sequential chunk.

Payload chunks are represented as payloadchunk = { "#mandatory" : [ "payload", "signature" ], "payload" : "base64", "signature" : "base64" } where:

  • payload is the Base64-encoded encrypted payload (payload)
  • signature is the Base64-encoded verification data of the payload

The payload is represented as payload = { "#mandatory" : [ "sequencenumber", "messageid", "data" ], "sequencenumber" : "int64(1,2^53^)", "messageid" : "int64(0,2^53^)", "endofmsg" : "boolean", "compressionalgo" : "enum(GZIP|LZW)", "data" : "base64" } where:

  • sequencenumber is the chunk sequence number
  • messageid is the message ID
  • endofmsg indicates this is the last payload of the message
  • compressionalgo indicates the algorithm used to compress the data
  • data is the Base64-encoded optionally compressed application data

Constructor Detail

PayloadChunk

public PayloadChunk(long sequenceNumber,
                    long messageId,
                    boolean endofmsg,
                    MslConstants.CompressionAlgorithm compressionAlgo,
                    byte[] data,
                    ICryptoContext cryptoContext)
             throws MslEncodingException,
                    MslCryptoException,
                    MslException
Construct a new payload chunk with the given message ID, data and provided crypto context. If requested, the data will be compressed before encrypting.

Parameters:
sequenceNumber - sequence number.
messageId - the message ID.
endofmsg - true if this is the last payload chunk of the message.
compressionAlgo - the compression algorithm. May be null for no compression.
data - the payload chunk application data.
cryptoContext - the crypto context.
Throws:
MslEncodingException - if there is an error encoding the JSON data.
MslCryptoException - if there is an error encrypting or signing the payload chunk.
MslException - if there is an error compressing the data.

PayloadChunk

public PayloadChunk(JSONObject payloadChunkJO,
                    ICryptoContext cryptoContext)
             throws MslEncodingException,
                    MslCryptoException,
                    MslMessageException,
                    MslException

Construct a new payload chunk from the provided JSON object.

The provided crypto context will be used to decrypt and verify the data signature.

Parameters:
payloadChunkJO - the JSON object.
cryptoContext - the crypto context.
Throws:
MslCryptoException - if there is a problem decrypting or verifying the payload chunk.
MslEncodingException - if there is a problem parsing the JSON.
MslMessageException - if the compression algorithm is not known, or the payload data is corrupt or missing.
MslException - if there is an error uncompressing the data.

getData

public byte[] getData()
Returns the application data if we were able to decrypt it.

Returns:
the chunk application data. May be empty (zero-length).
